summary: Comprehensive testing of multi-user gym workout tracker app. All 22 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with profile selection, multi-user switching, collapsible day cards, add/delete days (max 4 enforced), add/delete exercises, exercise checklist, edit dialog with muscle group selector, workout completion with report, and history section. All text in English, orange accent color correct, profile colors correct (Andrea=amber, Roy=blue, Romi=green).
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/profiles returns 3 users with correct structure and colors
Backend: GET /api/workout-plans requires user_id parameter (422 without)
Backend: GET /api/workout-plans?user_id=andrea returns Andrea's plans only
Backend: GET /api/workout-plans?user_id=roy returns Roy's plans only
Backend: GET /api/workout-plans?user_id=romi returns Romi's plans only
Backend: Data isolation verified - each user has separate data
Backend: POST /api/workout-plans creates new day (max 4 enforced)
Backend: DELETE /api/workout-plans/{day} removes day
Backend: POST /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises adds exercise
Backend: PUT /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises/{id} updates exercise
Backend: DELETE /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises/{id} removes exercise
Backend: PUT /api/workout-plans/{day}/exercises/{id}/load updates load
Backend: POST /api/exercise-logs creates log
Backend: GET /api/exercise-logs/{id} retrieves logs
Backend: POST /api/workout-sessions creates session with report
Backend: GET /api/workout-sessions returns user's sessions
Backend: GET /api/workout-sessions/{id} returns individual session
Backend: GET /api/next-workout returns next day and last sessions
Backend: POST /api/seed creates data for all 3 users
Frontend: Profile selection shows 3 profiles (Andrea, Roy, Romi)
Frontend: Profile avatars have correct colors (amber, blue, green)
Frontend: Clicking profile stores in localStorage and shows dashboard
Frontend: Dashboard shows user's name in header (e.g. ANDREA'S SCHEDULE)
Frontend: Profile avatar click (logout) returns to profile selection
Frontend: localStorage cleared on logout
Frontend: Multi-user switching works correctly
Frontend: Day 1 expanded with 'Next' badge
Frontend: Day 2 and 3 collapsed by default
Frontend: Collapsible cards expand/collapse on click
Frontend: Add Day button opens dialog, creates new day
Frontend: Max 4 days enforced by backend
Frontend: Delete Day button with confirmation removes a day
Frontend: Start Workout navigates to /workout/{dayNumber}
Frontend: Exercise checklist checkboxes toggle completion
Frontend: Progress bar updates as exercises are checked
Frontend: Completed exercises show strikethrough
Frontend: Edit button opens EditExerciseDialog
Frontend: Edit dialog has name, sets, reps, load, muscle group fields
Frontend: Muscle group selector in edit dialog
Frontend: Delete exercise button in edit dialog
Frontend: Save Permanently toggle in edit dialog
Frontend: Add Exercise button creates new exercise via API
Frontend: Exercise detail sheet shows current load
Frontend: Exercise detail sheet has update load input
Frontend: Complete Workout button opens completion sheet
Frontend: Completion sheet shows volume and exercises completed
Frontend: Duration input in completion sheet
Frontend: Save Workout creates session with report
Frontend: Workout Report shows duration, volume, exercises completed
Frontend: Back To Dashboard returns to /
Frontend: Recent History section on dashboard shows completed sessions
Frontend: History items have colored borders matching day
Frontend: Clicking history item navigates to /history/{id}
Frontend: History detail shows stats (duration, volume, exercises)
Frontend: History detail shows exercises performed with loads
Frontend: Back button from history detail works
Frontend: Theme toggle switches between dark/light mode
Frontend: Orange accent color (HSL 25 90% 60%)
Frontend: All text in English (no Italian text remaining)
Frontend: Bodyweight exercises show 'â€”' instead of load
test_credentials: No credentials needed - uses profile selection (Andrea, Roy, Romi)
seed_data_creation: Database seeded via /api/seed endpoint for all 3 users with 3 days each
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-user gym workout tracker fully tested. Backend has 22 pytest tests covering profiles, workout plans, exercises, logs, sessions with user_id isolation. Frontend tested on 430x932 mobile viewport. Key features: 3 profiles (Andrea/Roy/Romi), collapsible day cards, add/delete days (max 4), add/delete exercises, exercise checklist, edit dialog with muscle group selector, exercise detail sheet with load chart, workout completion with report, history section with colored borders. All text in English, orange accent color, profile colors correct. localStorage key is 'gym-user'.
